content.description:
A fun climb that finishes on good patina flakes.

Sit start at a sidepull and a good crimp for the right hand.

Make a few hard pulls to gain the lip and then bust a move up and right to the smooth patina of the beautiful quartz monzonite.

Top out more easily.

The best way down is down the patina.
content.location: This is the same start as "Freeze Short" and "Freeze All Cylinders", slightly left of the arete.

content.description:
Sit start at a small flat edge for the right hand and a sidepull for the left.

Climb up and traverse left to the big slopey hold. Make a very tricky mantel and finish up the slab.

Starting at the boss itself and pulling off the mantel goes at

v5

and is called

"Zero Mantel".

A

v6

version finishing slightly right is also available to climb called

"Kick the Boss".

"Freeze Short" is a climb with the same start as

"Freeze All Cylinders"

but climb up and left to gain a good edge at the lip for the right hand.

Finish as for

"Kick the Boss"

. This one goes at

v8

as well and is slightly contrived.

Going left hand to the edge makes reaching out right to good patina flakes possible, which is a

v4

called

"No Sense, No Reason".
content.location:
This climb is located on the Edge of Reason Boulder.

From the Checkerboard Boulder hike down into the deep ravine and up the other side. This boulder is the next one visible.

content.description:
Sit start at the arete below the good patina flakes. Climb up via a hard move to get established on the flake and finish up a fun v0.

Good warm up for harder climbs in the area.
content.location: On the Edge of Reason Boulder to the right of "Freeze All Cylinders" and "Kick the Boss".

content.description:
Hang start from the jug towards the left side of the boulder.

Stay low and traverse right on mediocre holds with good unique climbing and technique. Top out at the right arete on good patina.

This problem finishes on "No Sense, No Reason".
